newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: Telecom restructures Trans-Tasman service.
newsitem.headline: Telecom restructures Trans-Tasman service.

text.p: Telecom Corp of New Zealand Ltd said on Thursday it had restructured trans-Tasman customer services by establishing a services and a networks division.
Telecom said the services division, headed by National Manager Australa, Vlad Sorokin, would focus on increased service to about 120 companies with New Zealand business links.
The networks division, led by Brett O'Reilly, Regional Manager Australia and Papua New Guinea, would concentrate on fostering opportunities with Australian carriers.
